CPU/overview.command: -t "CPU usage overview" --upper-limit 100 --lower-limit 0 --rigid --color BACK$COLOR_BACKGROUND$ --color SHADEA$COLOR_BACKGROUND$ --color SHADEB$COLOR_BACKGROUND$ --color FONT$COLOR_FONT$ --color AXIS$COLOR_AXIS$ --color ARROW$COLOR_ARROW$ DEF:wait=cpu/percent-wait.rrd:value:AVERAGE DEF:user=cpu/percent-user.rrd:value:AVERAGE DEF:system=cpu/percent-system.rrd:value:AVERAGE DEF:steal=cpu/percent-steal.rrd:value:AVERAGE DEF:softirq=cpu/percent-softirq.rrd:value:AVERAGE DEF:nice=cpu/percent-nice.rrd:value:AVERAGE DEF:interrupt=cpu/percent-interrupt.rrd:value:AVERAGE DEF:idle=cpu/percent-idle.rrd:value:AVERAGE LINE:wait$COLOR_LINE_1$:"wait\l" LINE:user$COLOR_LINE_1$:"user\l":STACK LINE:system$COLOR_LINE_1$:"system\l":STACK LINE:steal$COLOR_LINE_1$:"steal\l":STACK LINE:softirq$COLOR_LINE_1$:"softirq\l":STACK LINE:nice$COLOR_LINE_1$:"nice\l":STACK LINE:interrupt$COLOR_LINE_1$:"interrupt\l":STACK LINE:idle$COLOR_LINE_1$:"idle\l":STACK
